start.mainText: It’s easy to get started on Airbnb

subText1.title: Tell us about your place
subText1.subtitle: Share some basic info, like where it is and how many guests can stay.

subText2.title: Make it stand out
subText2.subtitle: Add photos plus a title and description—we’ll help you out.

subText3.title: Finish up and publish
subText3.subtitle: Choose if you'd like to start with an experienced guest, set a starting price, and publish your listing.

category.title: Which of these best describes your place?

description.title: Next, let's describe your apartment
description.subtitle: Share what makes your place special.

images.title: Add some photos of your apartment
images.subtitle: You'll need {{count}} photos to get started. You can add more or make changes later.

info.title: Share some basics about your place
info.subtitle: You'll add more details later, like bed types.

location.title: Where's your place located?
location.subtitle: Your address is only shared with guests after they’ve made a reservation.

title.title: Now, let's give your apartment a title
title.subtitle: Short titles work best. Have fun with it—you can always change it later.

final.title: Yay! It’s time to publish.
final.subtitle: Here's what we'll show to guests. Before you publish, make sure to review the details.

content1.title: Set up your calendar
content1.subtitle: Choose which dates are available. Guests can start booking 24 hours after you publish.

content2.title: Adjust your settings
content2.subtitle: Set house rules, select a cancellation policy, choose how guests can book, and more.

content3.title: Prepare for your first guest
content3.subtitle: Find tips in our Resource Center or get one-to-one guidance from a Superhost.
